ivardefs.name: authoredOn
ivardefs.desc: The date and time this task was created.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: BasedOn refers to a higher-level authorization that triggered the creation of the task.  It references a "request" resource such as a ServiceRequest, MedicationRequest, ServiceRequest, CarePlan, etc. which is distinct from the "request" resource the task

ivardefs.name: businessStatus
ivardefs.desc: Contains business-specific nuances of the business state.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: A name or code (or both) briefly describing what the task involves.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free-text description of what is to be performed.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The healthcare event  (e.g. a patient and healthcare provider interaction) during which this task was created.

ivardefs.name: executionPeriod
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the time action was first taken against the task (start) and/or the time final action was taken against the task prior to marking it as completed (end).

ivardefs.name: focus
ivardefs.desc: The request being actioned or the resource being manipulated by this task.

ivardefs.name: for
ivardefs.desc: The entity who benefits from the performance of the service specified in the task (e.g., the patient).

ivardefs.name: groupIdentifier
ivardefs.desc: An identifier that links together multiple tasks and other requests that were created in the same context.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: The business identifier for this task.

ivardefs.name: input_
ivardefs.desc: Additional information that may be needed in the execution of the task.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesCanonical
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to a *FHIR*-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Task.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesUri
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an *externally* maintained  protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Task.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Insurance plans, coverage extensions, pre-authorizations and/or pre-determinations that may be relevant to the Task.

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the "level" of actionability associated with the Task, i.e. i+R[9]Cs this a proposed task, a planned task, an actionable task, etc.

ivardefs.name: lastModified
ivardefs.desc: The date and time of last modification to this task.

ivardefs.name: location
ivardefs.desc: Principal physical location where the this task is performed.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Free-text information captured about the task as it progresses.

ivardefs.name: output_
ivardefs.desc: Outputs produced by the Task.

ivardefs.name: owner
ivardefs.desc: Individual organization or Device currently responsible for task execution.

ivardefs.name: partOf_
ivardefs.desc: Task that this particular task is part of.

ivardefs.name: performerType_
ivardefs.desc: The kind of participant that should perform the task.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the Task should be addressed with respect to other requests.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode
ivardefs.desc: A description or code indicating why this task needs to be performed.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference
ivardefs.desc: A resource reference indicating why this task needs to be performed.

ivardefs.name: relevantHistory_
ivardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this Task that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the task.

ivardefs.name: requester
ivardefs.desc: The creator of the task.

ivardefs.name: restriction
ivardefs.desc: If the Task.focus is a request resource and the task is seeking fulfillment (i.e. is asking for the request to be actioned), this element identifies any limitations on what parts of the referenced request should be actioned.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The current status of the task.

ivardefs.name: statusReason
ivardefs.desc: An explanation as to why this task is held, failed, was refused, etc.
